name: Final Embrace Master
text: Few creatures can survive the crushing horror of your Final Embrace.
prerequisites: Str 17, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; Final Embrace; Final Embrace Horror; base attack bonus +9.
benefit: Double the number of damage dice for your constrict special attack.
staminaText: Each time you constrict, you can spend 5 stamina points to triple the damage dice of your constrict ability instead of doubling them.
text_zh: 很少有生物能活着离开你粉碎性的最终拥抱。
prerequisites_zh: 力量17，智力3，纳迦、蛇人或拥有＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的生物，最终拥抱，恐怖最终拥抱，BAB+9。
benefit_zh: 你的＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的伤害骰翻倍。
staminaText_zh: 每当你擒抱时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将来自你紧勒能力的伤害骰翻三倍而不是两倍。
